articles.title: NFL receiver Rondale Moore found dead in his Indiana hometown
articles.description:
Rondale Moore, the NFL receiver who had season-ending training camp knee injuries in each of the last two years after a standout college career at Purdue and a promising start with the Arizona Cardinals, was found dead Saturday, authorities said
